The Amityville Curse

Ano: 1990

Sinopse: Debbie and Marvin invest in the evil Amityville House to make a profit. But this place comes with baggage: its dark past is undying. And as the couple and their friends renovate the ramshackle colonial mansion, spine-chilling supernatural incidents soon put everyone's logic to the test. As a result, Debbie now faces grave danger; haunted by terrifying nightmares, she questions her sanity. Are the horrible visions connected to the brutal murder of a local priest years before, or are they a blood-curdling warning from beyond? If evil never dies, can the innocent new residents break free from the sinister Amityville curse?—Nick Riganas
